meanings.definition: A pastry consisting of thin layers of puff pastry filled with cream or custard.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a delicious napoleon for dessert.
meanings.sent2: The bakery had fresh napoleons on display.
meanings.sent3: The napoleon looked so tempting, I couldn't resist taking a bite.
meanings.sent4: The layers of the napoleon were as delicate as a butterfly's wings.
meanings.sent5: The creamy filling in the napoleon melted in my mouth.

meanings.sent1: Napoleon Bonaparte was a famous historical figure.
meanings.sent2: The portrait of Napoleon hangs in the museum.
meanings.sent3: Imagine if Napoleon came back to life and visited our town!
meanings.sent4: His ambition was as grand as Napoleon's conquests.
meanings.sent5: The people cheered for Napoleon as he rode through the streets.

meanings.definition: A type of military hat with a flat top and visor.
meanings.sent1: The soldier wore a napoleon during the parade.
meanings.sent2: The general's napoleon added a touch of elegance to his uniform.
meanings.sent3: The napoleon shielded the soldier's eyes from the sun.
meanings.sent4: The napoleon perched on the soldier's head like a proud bird.
meanings.sent5: The shiny badge on the napoleon gleamed in the sunlight.
